name: DS Double Sys
description:
Popular the world over, the hit game console is now available for the iPhone and iPod touch!

"Double Sys" can turn your device to a "Handheld Game Console"!!

Features:
- 3D environment
- 3D Zoom to both upper and lower screen
- Can change Case Color
- Can change Game Card
- Simulate game device OS
- Play game to earn game point.
- Using game point to unlock more games and case color.

Game Cards:
- Include two games: "Pixel Mania"(Music Game) and a SECRET GAME.

Future Additions:
- More Game Card
- More Case Color
- Microphone function

Languages:
- English

Requirements:
- iPhone and iPod touch
- OS 3.0 compatible

For more information, please visit our web site:
www.ZM2Dev.com
